message: Continue the current dialogue:Assistent:We are happy to hear that  I have added a presentation with the available properties, it's ROI and the pricing of the project that you have shown interest in. Can I share a presentation with you that includes information about our projects, ROI, and pricing?;Assistent:Great! I'll arrange for our specialist to contact you about a video call to show the detailed floor plans of the 2-bedroom villa.
